metadata.title: SCUBA 507 - Marine Experiences at Coiba National Park
metadata.description: Scuba diving, snorkeling, and exclusive marine experiences at Coiba National Park, Panama. Guided dives, diving courses, and personalized tours.
metadata.services_description: Discover our scuba diving, snorkeling, courses, and marine experiences at Coiba National Park.
metadata.gallery_description: Photo and video gallery of our marine experiences at Coiba National Park, Panama.
metadata.about_description: Meet the SCUBA 507 team and discover why Coiba National Park is a world-class diving destination.
metadata.booking_description: Book your marine experience with SCUBA 507 at Coiba National Park, Panama.

hero.headline: Dive Into Paradise
hero.subtitle: Exclusive marine experiences at Coiba National Park

why_us.title: Why Dive With Us?
why_us.coiba_desc: UNESCO World Heritage Site, home to the largest coral reefs in the Eastern Pacific.
why_us.marine_desc: Sharks, rays, sea turtles, moray eels, and thousands of tropical fish species await you.
why_us.exclusive_desc: Small groups and personalized attention for a safe and unforgettable experience.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Exclusive marine experiences at Coiba National Park
services.park_fee_desc: Coiba National Park entrance fee is not included in our services (except Underwater Marriage Proposal): $20 USD per person for foreigners and $5 USD per person for Panamanians.
services.fishing_desc: Ask us about our fishing tours. Contact us for more information!
services.accommodation_desc: Ask about our lodging options in Pixvae.

buceo.name: Scuba Diving
buceo.subtitle: 2 Dives
buceo.description: This service is for certified divers who want to continue increasing their number of dives and underwater experiences.
includes: Full equipment rental (mask, fins, regulator, BCD, wetsuit, weight belt, and 2 tanks)

discovery.name: Discovery Dive
discovery.subtitle: Baptism - 1 Dive
discovery.description: This service is for those who want to live their first diving experience and discover the underwater world in an easy and fun way.
includes: Full equipment rental (mask, fins, regulator, BCD, wetsuit, weight belt, and 2 tanks)

snorkeling.name: Snorkeling & Beaches Tour
snorkeling.subtitle: 3 Locations in Coiba National Park
snorkeling.description: This service is for those who want to explore the underwater world without the need for autonomous diving equipment.
includes: Visit to 3 different locations in Coiba National Park

open_water.name: Open Water Diving Course
open_water.subtitle: Full Certification
open_water.description: Get your open water diving certification with dives at one of the best diving sites in the world.
includes: Full equipment rental (mask, fins, regulator, BCD, wetsuit, weight belt, and 2 tanks)

adaptive.name: Adaptive Diving Tour
adaptive.subtitle: Inclusive Diving
adaptive.description: Adaptive diving experience for people with disabilities. A safe and personalized dive in the waters of Coiba National Park.
includes: Full equipment rental (mask, fins, regulator, BCD, wetsuit, weight belt, and 2 tanks)

proposal.name: Underwater Marriage Proposal
proposal.subtitle: Private Tour
proposal.description: Ask the most important question of your life in an unforgettable underwater setting. Private tour for 2 people with everything included.
includes: Full equipment rental (mask, fins, regulator, BCD, wetsuit, weight belt, and 2 tanks)
Coiba National Park entrance fee included

about.title: About Us
about.intro_text: We are a company created to provide exclusive, safe, and fun marine experiences. We operate from Pixvae, in the Province of Veraguas, Panama, at the gateway to Coiba National Park.
about.mission_text: To offer unique and accessible marine experiences, promoting respect for the ocean and the conservation of Coiba National Park's marine biodiversity.
about.coiba_text1: Coiba National Park has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2005. Spanning 2,701 kmÂ², it is the largest marine protected area in Central America.
about.coiba_text2: Its waters are home to the most extensive coral reefs in the Tropical Eastern Pacific, hosting sharks, humpback whales, manta rays, sea turtles, and over 800 fish species.
about.team_text: Francisco and Sebas are certified diving instructors with years of experience in the waters of Coiba National Park. Their passion for the ocean and dedication to safety guarantee an unforgettable experience.
about.location_text: We are located in Pixvae, Province of Veraguas, Panama. Pixvae is a small coastal town that serves as the gateway to Coiba National Park.

booking.title: Book Now
booking.subtitle: Book your marine experience
booking.name: Full Name
booking.message_placeholder: Tell us about your group, special needs, or any questions...
booking.success: Thank you! Your request has been sent. We'll contact you soon.
booking.park_fee_desc: Coiba National Park entrance fee not included: $20 USD foreigners / $5 USD Panamanians.

footer.description: Exclusive marine experiences at Coiba National Park, Panama.
